title: Soul of Searing Steel - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Betrayal   Game Elements   Kingdoms   Knights   Level System   Maids   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Military   Multiple POV   Nobles   Politics   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Transported into a Game World   Wars
author: Gloomy Sky Hidden God   阴天神隐
description: Joshua woke up in the middle of a battlefield one day only to discover that he has been transmigrated into a popular MMORPG, Continental War. Discovering that he has not only been displaced in space but also in time, Joshua realizes he has knowledge of the events unfolding around the world as he had played through them as game events. Read on to discover how Joshua forges his path towards becoming a legendary warrior!>
